I'll show you an example - tap the Natur: Ke tla go bontsha sekai- tobetsa sethlogo sa Thlolego
You can choose a start date and end date: O ka ithlopela lethla la go simolola le la gofetsa sethlogo seno.
You can choose a language for this theme: O ka ithlopela puo ya sethlogo seno. Ke tla go bontsha ditiro ka puo eno fa e le teng.
Great! I have planned all your activitie: Go siame ! ke rulagantse ditiro tsohle tsa gago! Tobetsa tiro go bona dinthla.
See the activity details here. You're al: Bona dinthla tsa tiro fano.O feditse ka go tsenya sethlogo!
If you don't want to use a theme, you ca: Fa o sa batle godirisa sethlogo,o ka tobetsa fano go thlopa tiro!
Great! Now the activity is selected. Whe: Go siame! Jaanong tiro e thlopilwe .Fa o batla go ithuta go le gontsi ka tiro ngwe , o ka tobetsa letshwao leno,.
